subtitle: UNTIL THE WEDDING OF
surah: And one of His signs is that He created mates for you from yourselves that you may find rest in them, and He put between you love and compassion; most surely there are signs in this for a people who reflect.
protocol_prologue: As an effort to break the chain of COVID-19 transmission, we will apply these safety protocol at our future wedding ceremony
protocol_warning: all guests and invitees should pay attention and obey the applied health protocol
sad_announcement: And due to COVID-19, we are sad to announce that we are unable to invite every single one of our beloved friends to the wedding ceremony.
attendance_limit: The wedding ceremony will be limited to those who receive our offline invitation
live_streaming_prologue: However, to still be able to share our happiness, we decided to host a virtual live video ceremony for those who don't receive our invitation letter. We hope you will be joining us via live streaming for this happy occasion.
wishes_prologue: Yes, you can still send us wishes! Make sure you write down your name so that all of us can recognize you easily ^_^
gift_prologue: We also accept good intention in any form. Should you wish to send us gifts, you can send them to this address.

guest_form.title: YOU'RE GETTING CLOSER
guest_form.subtitle: Please let us know your name, phone number, and address before weshow you ours

gift_form.title: THANK YOU
gift_form.address_prologue: Our plan was to live in Jakarta after we are married. But COVID hits us --well, everyone actually-- hard. Given the circumstances, we will be staying in Jogja at the moment. Should you wish to send us gifts, you can send them to this address.
gift_form.emoney_prologue: Or if youâ€™re into electronic money, we accept these methods
